Name: Anime Desktop Girls
About the game: Anime Desktop Girls This is an anime pet you can place anywhere on your desktop. You can continue working on other applications while giving you something interesting to look at and brighten up your desktop. Features: • Choose between 4 different girls • Remove or add pieces of clothing individually • Contains 30 poses • Free moving, scaling and rotation with mouse • Supports scaling with keyboard • Saves location on exit • Saves preferred girl on exit • Moveable settings window • Compatible with live wallpaper software • Reset position
